attributes.action: Help Diver: Vincent Woolsgrove. Imprisoned for 2 years
attributes.background: Diver Vincent Woolsgrove, has been sentenced to two years in prison for finding shipwrecked articles and selling them. He has been sentenced to two years in prison and ordered to pay £35,000 court costs. Peadophilles get 6 month suspended sentence, they are a risk to the public notVincent Woolsgrove

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

It is clear that you are concerned about the sentence that was given in this case, and how this compares to other sentences. If you would like the guidelines for sentencing in different kinds of case to be reviewed, you could start a petition about that. You can find out more about sentencing guidelines here:

https://www.sentencingcouncil.org.uk/about-sentencing/about-guidelines/
